Player History
Had first career hit (double) on 4/9/1980, off Brandon Kelly (NJ)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1980, off Thomas Folger (SHP)...
Drove in 6 runs against Malibu on 7/19/1984...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/5/1985 to a 3-year deal worth $3,008,100 per year...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Boston (FBA), driving in 5 runs on 8/5/1986...
Drove in 6 runs against Northeastern on 10/1/1986...
Traded from Bay City to Pontiac on 7/31/1989 (Going to PON: 1B P. Ward. Going to BC: P T. Veasley, 2B P. Harker)...
Injured on 4/5/1990 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Pontiac to Capital City on 4/26/1991 (Going to CC: 1B P. Ward. Going to PON: LF J. Lemen, C A. Griffin)...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/24/1992 to a 1-year deal worth $478,000 per year...
Released by Pontiac on 7/28/1992...
